Well, I'm not going to agrue that, because it's pointless. 

But I will say, from my own experience, that the divide on female/male weebs and otakus is pretty close to 50/50, but females being the majority. You see it in cosplay events, anime pfp pictures (because for some reason they put characters that "look" like them irl) and even like I mentioned: fanfiction.

this from yours truly, a frequent anime/manga consumer

parent.body:
Saying just ''there are many people on earth, so what'' is ignorant. 

In western countries, white people are being replaced because of low birthrates in favour of blacks/muslims. Muslims in Europe breed extremely fast (they don't work, get free money, so they have as much kids as possible). White people are being destroyed and killed in their own countries because of low birthrates. Because we are told that career is more important than kids, experiences are more important than kids, you shouldn't waste your best years on starting a family, kids are bad for climate ... and other bullshit. 

And its also a financial problem (or at least, in my country because of how pensions work) because there will be soon more seniors taking pension than people in productive age, and the pension system could crumble. With low birth rates and abortions, we are digging ourselves a grave.

"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body: We did have organized religion. And it's been a farce every single time. The church and later the bible canon were created to suppress early Christianity and control the masses as usual. Before that we had a centralized hybrid of Babylonian-Israelite-Judahite faith which became Judaism. Before that it was the Levitical priesthood and Israelite and Judahite paganism, which was so prevelant that historians quite understandly mistake it for preceding monotheism. After the church we got Islam, then thousands of protestant denominations who complain about the scandals of the catholic church and then pull the same exact crap themselves. Who knows what they did in 30,000 BC, or any other time, or in other parts of the world, but I'm willing to bet it was the same old "make a phony cult to get people in line and tell them to always worship the tribe and serve the elites, and don't let them find out about the real God, only what we tell them". That's always the response to get people in line again after an awakening. Humans are so fucking predictable.

Before that it was the Levitical priesthood and Israelite and Judahite paganism, which was so prevelant that historians quite understandly mistake it for preceding monotheism. After the church we got Islam, then thousands of protestant denominations who complain about the scandals of the catholic church and then pull the same exact crap themselves. That's always the response to get people in line again after an awakening. Humans are so fucking predictable.

parent.body:
> Would you rather live their cramped lives just for some petty bragging rights about your country's population count?

Non sequitur, strawman.

> Them trying to take over the US would be a joke

Right now, yes, but not forever. Higher population means more productive capacity, which means they'll eventually overtake the US and then _they'll_ not only be more populous but also more advanced. What then?

body:
> Did you spent at least 5 minutes studying what islam is about?

I mean the radical kind that's more prevalent in the middle east, not the normal people who believe in Islam like you usually see in other countries:

* Treats women like property

* Theocracy

* Wants to forcefully take over other countries

* Throws gays off the top of buildings

* Strong central government

* Censorship

* Silencing of dissidents

* Worst enemy is Israel

* Wants supremacy of own race

* "Strong Leader" obsession (has a Supreme Leader)

That sounds quite a bit like most of those who label themselves white nationalists.

> Despite your weird theory how current christianity is all false, I hope you'll realise once how wrong you were, and that every word of Bible is to be taken seriously as a word of God.

Nope, God never sanctioned any bible. That would be the Roman church, 382 AD (and they got this idea from *Marcion*), and that didn't become the standard everywhere for centuries still. But let's assume he did; the only racial argument you could possibly derive from it is *Jewish* supremacy, not European. Yet that is also contradicted by even more arguing against it, in both old testament law and the gospels, which is why biblical infallibility comes crashing down.

We have discovered more about early Christianity in the past century than anything in the thousands of years before. And even atheist hitorians have to admit that the Christians were moral beyond what was conceivable in the ancient world. The hierarchial church structure was not a thing, not even a pastor, an "apostle" simply meant messenger or evangelist (although Paul was a boaster so he often thinks of himself with more authority than he has). There *are* references to "deacons"...but the first of them is Phoebe (and women cannot occupy this role according to modern Christendom) and the role seems to be more like volunteer work than an authoratative position in the church. But the most stark contrast is how modern Christianity focuses primarly on promoting a certain side of the "culture wars" and pays little attention to anything outlined in any of the gospels, which often contradicts their positions.
body_html:
Did you spent at least 5 minutes studying what islam is about?

I mean the radical kind that's more prevalent in the middle east, not the normal people who believe in Islam like you usually see in other countries:

  • Treats women like property

  • Theocracy

  • Wants to forcefully take over other countries

  • Throws gays off the top of buildings

  • Strong central government

  • Censorship

  • Silencing of dissidents

  • Worst enemy is Israel

  • Wants supremacy of own race

  • "Strong Leader" obsession (has a Supreme Leader)

That sounds quite a bit like most of those who label themselves white nationalists.

Despite your weird theory how current christianity is all false, I hope you'll realise once how wrong you were, and that every word of Bible is to be taken seriously as a word of God.

Nope, God never sanctioned any bible. That would be the Roman church, 382 AD (and they got this idea from Marcion), and that didn't become the standard everywhere for centuries still. But let's assume he did; the only racial argument you could possibly derive from it is Jewish supremacy, not European. Yet that is also contradicted by even more arguing against it, in both old testament law and the gospels, which is why biblical infallibility comes crashing down.

We have discovered more about early Christianity in the past century than anything in the thousands of years before. And even atheist hitorians have to admit that the Christians were moral beyond what was conceivable in the ancient world. The hierarchial church structure was not a thing, not even a pastor, an "apostle" simply meant messenger or evangelist (although Paul was a boaster so he often thinks of himself with more authority than he has). There are references to "deacons"...but the first of them is Phoebe (and women cannot occupy this role according to modern Christendom) and the role seems to be more like volunteer work than an authoratative position in the church. But the most stark contrast is how modern Christianity focuses primarly on promoting a certain side of the "culture wars" and pays little attention to anything outlined in any of the gospels, which often contradicts their positions.

parent.body:
> My suspicion is because waifus. There's a reason why people such as SMG4 gained 10x the audience by drastically decreasing their quality to give more screen time to girls who are obviously designed to appeal to horny males. That's what anime does too.

Used to avidly watch SMG4 because it was at one point a really funny evolution of YouTube Poop. I knew something was off with his more recent content but I couldn't put my finger on it until you just pointed it out.

SMG4 has been giving a lot more screen time to his more sexualised OCs who simply don't fit the universe of video game parodies, namely Tari and Meggy. In the case of Meggy it's particularly concerning because she's an inkling, and inklings from the Splatoon universe are made to look like mid-teen girls...

In my view that was the point where his channel declined, not when he scrapped the Retarded64 series in order to become more "advertiser friendly."

body:
> Not even the fact that I can give birth and nurture life is to be revered, protected, or considered unique anymore.

Being more valuable because you're less expendable makes sense biologically but is absolute shit morality. Being born with the more precious organ was no merit of your own. Men biologically have way more mental problems and yet are still expected to be perfect to be considered worth anything, while women are valued just for existing, while their brain chemistry is also far superior. That is not the slightest bit fair.
body_html:
Not even the fact that I can give birth and nurture life is to be revered, protected, or considered unique anymore.

Being more valuable because you're less expendable makes sense biologically but is absolute shit morality. Being born with the more precious organ was no merit of your own. guild.description: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!
guild.description_html: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!
guild.name: UnpopularOpinion

parent.body:
Yep, I hate trannies. At the core of it, you may be somewhat right. Women are unique creatures. We are the only gender that create, nurture and give birth to Life. The uterus is the closest humanity will ever get to being God. I have absolutely no problem admitting that. 

Am I as strong as a man, or can I run as fast? No. But I'm more flexible, more agile, able to get into smaller places. There are things I can do no man will ever be able to do. (to the below posters): Breaking it down to "Men are Stronger, so men are better women" is missing billions of nuances and points that have nothing to do with physical strength. 

Women (and Men) each have a unique life experience and perspective. I have grown up into a woman with an extremely unique perspective no man can have. (Just as men have a unique perspective no woman can have). There are a billion little moments in my life that make me a unique woman, that *because* I am a woman, has shaped and honed my personality. If were not a woman, all of that would be different. My womanhood is as much a part of me as my eye color. 

I will never know what it's like to be a man who grew up as a boy, to a teen boy, to an Adult with his male gender a unique part of him. And no man, no matter how many hormones they take or fake breasts they get, will Ever know what it's like to be a little girl, a teenage girl, an Adult Woman--A Wife, a Mother.... That will never, ever be a part of HIM. Those experiences that make a Woman (or a Man) will never belong to them, and therefore, they will never, ever truly BE the opposite gender. End of the Discussion. 

Yet, here they come along telling me that Nothing about me is Unique. My womanhood isn't special. They can be a woman, too. No. You can't. You never will be. They try to tell me I'm not deserving of privacy in private places. They tell women we don't deserve Anything at all because Men are Women, too. Not even the fact that I can give birth and nurture life is to be revered, protected, or considered unique anymore. Its even come to the point where people are trying to tell me that I shouldn't fight back against sexual assault or invasion of my spaces, because if I do, that makes me a bigot. 

They are -- literally-- trying to Erase my gender identity by claiming it for their own. They are trying to Erase womanhood itself. 

But they're also trying to erase Manhood. They're telling YOU that a woman can Be a Man, just like you. That She can know what it's like to be born a boy, grow up a boy, have the unique experiences of a Boy. All she has to do is roll into surgery and get a fake penis and she's a Better Man than You. If that's not pissing you off, you haven't thought this through very well. 

Men have certain privileges women don't have. Women have certain privileges men don't have. We both have them, you just want to play the victim and claim you don't. But right now, we're both being attacked by the same people who want to erase everything we are. Time to put away your victim card and join the whole Team in fighting this.....or we're both going to be erased.

Nice loophole to ignore a saying of Jesus.

> the irony is that jesus tells his disciples to take up a sword in the gospel of Luke. woops.

Yeah when they were literally coming to kill them first, and I know very few people who understand this literally. It's foolish to think this negates the tons of other things Jesus said.
body_html:
everyone dies, whether by a sword or not. Even god gets nailed to a cross ;)

Nice loophole to ignore a saying of Jesus.

the irony is that jesus tells his disciples to take up a sword in the gospel of Luke. woops.

Yeah when they were literally coming to kill them first, and I know very few people who understand this literally. It's foolish to think this negates the tons of other things Jesus said.

parent.body:
>Yeeeeeeaaaaah I don't think so

it's literally in the bible.

>All who live by the sword will die by the sword in the end

everyone dies, whether by a sword or not. Even god gets nailed to a cross ;)

>No wonder most of them rarely quote from Mark, Matthew, Luke, or John.

the irony is that jesus tells his disciples to take up a sword in the gospel of Luke. woops.

> leftists usually can't understand that these people are trying to kill us first

that's never been the case. like ever.

the right is a reactionary force to leftist injustice. this is very obvious in even just a basic reading of history. the crusades, both world wars, the French revolution , the american revolution, vietnam, the civil war, the war in iraq. ALL were responses to leftist cunts resisting evolution and getting violent

the Union did not instigate the civil war, the US did not instigate WW2. leftists did. we kill them in response.

we weren't killing you for no reason, you were incinerating jews ffs.
